summary: App with a lot size calculator; user is requesting a rollback/restore to Version 35 to match older behavior.
known_issues: Restore/rollback to Version 35 failed on a previous build attempt (implementation error).

existing_features.title: Restore the deployed application codebase to match the previously working **Version 35** state (full rollback), so the app behavior and UI match Version 35 rather than the current version.

Fix the restore/rollback workflow so the Version 35 restore succeeds (the previous restore attempt failed); ensure the build pipeline can complete a Version 35 restore without throwing an implementation error.
